pullrequest.title: Process insertions and deletions on gz log echo - fix issue #2136

content.raw: I can't comment on the light changes in this PR, but from a user perspective: the original issue I faced has been resolved and the SDF error is now gone. So, with this branch we will be able to use the --echo tool for ARIAC logs now, thank you
content.html: I can't comment on the light changes in this PR, but from a user perspective: the original issue I faced has been resolved and the SDF error is now gone. So, with this branch we will be able to use the --echo tool for ARIAC logs now, thank you
